string.name: about_summary
string.i: An application to help translating other android apps!

resources.string: Are you sure to delete current string.xml?
Discard the contents added to this page?
If you like to appreciate my work, please consider buying SmartPack Donation Package from Google Play as it is really helpful to continue my projects more active, although it is not at all necessary.

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this application entirely free, non-intrusive and without ads, please consider supporting the development in some way. Click here to know more. Thank you!
Please be careful with the special characters (%s) in your text!

In order to get this feature working on newer Android versions (Android R or newer), it is necessary to grant \"All files access\" permission to The Translator. Kindly grant the permission manually from the new screen opened after clicking the \"Grant\" button.
You\'ve entered some illegal characters! Your changes won\'t be saved.

Some character's are considered illegal in 'xml' format and are not acceptable! Please be noted that the entire text will be neglected (or even app crashes in the worst case) when an illegal character is detected! Some of the prohibited characters include, but are not limited to & - except for certain words < and > - except for certain cases such as , , , etc. Single (') or double (") quotation marks without a backward slash (\) in the front, etc.
\'%s\' is not a proper language string. Aborting!
You haven\'t imported any \'string\' translation file yet. Go to the \'Settings\' menu to import one from \'sdcard\'!
You haven\'t imported any translation \'string\' file yet!
Simply copy-paste the contents of an XML string file (partly or completely) on this screen and click the \'Apply\' button to continue.
Checkout more applications provided by the developer in Google Play
Permission denied for writing to storage!
Rate and/or Review The Translator in Google Play
New translation string is generated as \'%s\'!
%s already exists! Do you want to replace it?
Invite your friends to try The Translator
The Translator v%s can be obtained from Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunilpaulmathew.translator
The Translator is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!
Help me to translate this app! Click here to get the original language strings in English
Please select a file with %s extension.
